name: R√©cup√©rer les donn√©es du march√© spot Coinbase en temps r√©el avec GPT-4o + Telegram
description:
**L'agent AI de Coinbase r√©cup√®re instantan√©ment les donn√©es du march√© en temps r√©el directement dans Telegram !** 

Ce flux de travail int√®gre l'**API REST de Coinbase** avec **Telegram** (plus un **formatage aliment√© par l'IA** en option) pour fournir les derniers prix de crypto, livres de commandes, bougies et statistiques de trading en quelques secondes. Parfait pour les **traders de crypto, analystes et investisseurs** qui souhaitent des **donn√©es de march√© exploitables √† port√©e de main‚Äîsans cl√©s API.**

## **Comment √ßa fonctionne**

1. Un **bot Telegram** √©coute les demandes des utilisateurs (par exemple, `BTC-USD`).
2. Le flux de travail appelle les **points de terminaison publics de Coinbase** *(aucune cl√© requise)* pour r√©cup√©rer des donn√©es en temps r√©el :

   * **Dernier prix (ticker)**
   * **Statistiques sur 24h** (ouvert, haut, bas, cl√¥ture, volume)
   * **Instantan√©s du livre de commandes** (meilleure offre/demande + profondeur)
   * **Donn√©es de bougies** (OHLCV pour plusieurs intervalles)
   * **Transactions r√©centes** (ordres ex√©cut√©s)
3. Un **n≈ìud Calculateur** d√©rive des valeurs utiles comme le prix moyen et l'√©cart.
4. Un **n≈ìud AI ou ‚ÄúThink‚Äù** reformate le JSON en messages clairs et lisibles par l'homme.
5. Un **s√©parateur** garantit que les longs messages sont divis√©s en morceaux s√ªrs pour Telegram.
6. Les **informations de march√©** finales sont instantan√©ment renvoy√©es √† Telegram.

## **Ce que vous pouvez faire avec cet agent**

Ce bot Telegram vous permet de :

‚úÖ **Obtenir instantan√©ment le prix et les statistiques sur 24h** pour n'importe quelle paire spot de Coinbase.
‚úÖ **Surveiller les livres de commandes en direct** avec les meilleures offres/demandes.
‚úÖ **Analyser les donn√©es de bougies** (par exemple, 15m, 1h, 4h, 1j).
‚úÖ **Suivre les transactions r√©centes** pour voir l'activit√© du march√©.
‚úÖ **Recevoir des rapports clairs et structur√©s**‚Äîoptionnellement am√©lior√©s par l'IA.

## **√âtapes de configuration**

1. **Cr√©er un bot Telegram**

   * Utilisez [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) sur Telegram pour cr√©er votre bot et obtenir un jeton API.
2. **Configurer dans n8n**

   * Importez le JSON de flux de travail fourni.
   * Ajoutez vos **identifiants Telegram** (jeton de bot + votre ID Telegram pour l'authentification).
   * (Optionnel) Ajoutez une **cl√© OpenAI** si vous souhaitez un formatage am√©lior√© par l'IA.
3. **D√©ployer et tester**

   * Envoyez une requ√™te comme `BTC-USD` √† votre bot.
   * Recevez instantan√©ment des [donn√©es spot de Coinbase](https://www.coinbase.com/developer-platform/products/exchange-api) dans Telegram !

üöÄ **D√©bloquez des informations de march√© Coinbase puissantes et en temps r√©el directement dans Telegram‚Äîaucune cl√© API Coinbase requise !**

## üì∫ Tutoriel vid√©o de configuration

Regardez le guide de configuration complet sur YouTube :

[![Regarder sur YouTube](https://img.youtube.com/vi/AnLG0tnnhSs/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AnLG0tnnhSs)


---

## üßæ Licence & Attribution

¬© 2025 **Treasurium Capital Limited Company**
L'architecture, les invites et la structure des rapports de trading sont prot√©g√©es par des droits de propri√©t√© intellectuelle.
**Aucune rebranding ou revente non autoris√©e n'est permise.**

üîó Pour le support : [LinkedIn ‚Äì Don Jayamaha](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

nodes.name: Splits message is more than 4000 characters

parameters.content:
## Trigger Incoming Telegram Command
Node: Telegram Trigger
**Listens for new Telegram messages** from users.
Triggers the full agent process and passes raw user input downstream.

## Validate User Access
Node: User **Authentication
Checks incoming Telegram ID** against the approved user list.

## Generate Session Metadata
Node: Add S**essionId
Creates a sessionId using the Telegram chat_id**.
This is passed into all downstream tools for memory and workflow routing.

## Main AI Agent: Data Fetcher

**Node: Coinbase Data Agent**
This is the **core orchestrator**. It uses OpenAI only to **format and present raw Coinbase market data**, not to analyze or generate strategies.

It has direct **HTTP request access** to the Coinbase Exchange REST API and retrieves:

* **Live price** (`/products/{product_id}/ticker`)
* **24h ticker stats** (`/products/{product_id}/stats`)
* **Order book depth** (`/products/{product_id}/book?level=2`)
* **Best bid/ask** (`/products/{product_id}/book?level=1`)
* **Klines/candlesticks** (`/products/{product_id}/candles`)
* **Recent trades** (`/products/{product_id}/trades`)
* **Average price (derived)** ‚Üí midpoint from best bid/ask

The agent calls these endpoints in parallel for the requested `product_id` (e.g., `BTC-USD`), validates results, and then **presents the data in clean Telegram HTML format**.

It does **not**:

* Perform technical analysis
* Generate strategies or predictions
* Fetch sentiment or news

## Handle Telegram Message Limits
Node: Code (split logic)
Checks if the **GPT output exceeds 4000 characters**.
If so, it splits the message into safe chunks and passes them on sequentially.

## Send Final Report to Telegram
Node: Telegram sendMessage
Sends **formatted HTML report (or split chunks)** directly to the authenticated user via Telegram bot.

## GPT Model for Reasoning
Node: OpenAI Chat Model
Model: **gpt-4o-mini**
Used to:

Interpret signal values

Generate structured HTML

**Recommend spot and leverage trades**

### **Order Book Depth**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/book?level=2`
**What it does:** Returns the **order book** for a product. Use `level=1` for best bid/ask (L1) or `level=2` for aggregated depth (L2).
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `level` (INT, optional) ‚Üí `1` (top of book) or `2` (aggregated depth). Default: `2`.

**Returns (L2):** `bids: [[price, size], ...]`, `asks: [[price, size], ...]` plus metadata.
**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
level      = $fromAI('level', 2, 'number')
```

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/book

### **Best Bid/Ask (Book Ticker)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/book?level=1`
**What it does:** Returns the best **bid/ask** with sizes for the product.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `level` (INT, fixed = 1)

**Returns:** `{ "bids": [[price, size]], "asks": [[price, size]], "sequence": ... }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
level      = 1
```

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/book

## Short-Term Memory Module
Node: **Simple Memory
Stores the sessionId**, symbol, and other state data.
Useful for:

Multi-turn Telegram interactions

Tracking indicator agreement across timeframes

### **24h Stats**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/stats`
**What it does:** 24-hour rolling window stats: **open/high/low/last**, **volume**.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)

**Returns (FULL):** open, high, low, last, volume (24h).
**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
```

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{$fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string')}}/stats

### **Price (Latest)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/ticker`
**What it does:** Returns the **latest trade price** plus best bid/ask and volume for a product.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)

**Returns:** `{ "trade_id": ..., "price": "...", "size": "...", "bid": "...", "ask": "...", "volume": "...", "time": "..." }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
```
https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/ticker

### **Klines (Candles)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/candles`
**What it does:** Candlestick (OHLCV) data for a product.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `granularity` (INT, required) ‚Üí supported: 60, 300, 900, 3600, 21600, 86400 (1m, 5m, 15m, 1h, 6h, 1d)
* `start`, `end` (ISO8601, optional)

**Returns (array per candle):** `[ time, low, high, open, close, volume ]`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id  = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
granularity = $fromAI('granularity', 900, 'number')   # 900 = 15m default
```
https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/candles

### **Average Price (Derived)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/book?level=1`
**What it does:** Coinbase does not provide a direct average price endpoint. This tool fetches the **best bid/ask** and you can derive a midpoint average `(bid + ask)/2`.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `level` (INT, fixed = 1)

**Returns:** `{ "bids": [[price, size]], "asks": [[price, size]] }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
level      = 1
```

**Notes:** Use Calculator node to compute midpoint from bid/ask.

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/book

### **Recent Trades**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/trades`
**What it does:** Returns the **most recent trades** for a Coinbase product.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `limit` (INT, optional) ‚Üí number of trades to return (defaults ~100)

**Returns (array):** `[ { "time": "...", "trade_id": 123, "price": "...", "size": "...", "side": "buy|sell" }, ... ]`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
limit      = $fromAI('limit', 100, 'number')
```

**Notes:** Endpoint supports pagination via `before` / `after` cursors if you later need historical pages.

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/trades

parameters.description:
### üè∑ Tool: **Think**

**Purpose:**

* Lightweight **reasoning helper**.
* Lets the AI Agent process intermediate logic, format outputs, or decide how to combine multiple API results before sending the final report.
* Does not fetch data itself.

**Use cases:**

* Clean/reshape JSON from Binance endpoints
* Extract only the needed fields (e.g., `lastPrice`, `volume`)
* Help prepare data for Telegram message formatting

**n8n setup notes:**

* No API call, just an **AI Tool** node.
* Connect upstream API results ‚Üí Think ‚Üí Report Agent.

parameters.content:
### **Calculator**

**Purpose:**

* Perform **math operations** inside the workflow.
* Supports add/subtract/multiply/divide, percentages, rounding, etc.

**Use cases:**

* Calculate spreads (ask ‚Äì bid)
* Compute % changes from open vs. last price
* Normalize volumes or confidence scores

**n8n setup notes:**

* Node: `Calculator` (n8n built-in)
* Input fields can come from Binance API JSON
* Output can be chained into Think ‚Üí Final Report

### **Think**

**Purpose:**

* Lightweight **reasoning helper**.
* Lets the AI Agent process intermediate logic, format outputs, or decide how to combine multiple API results before sending the final report.
* Does not fetch data itself.

**Use cases:**

* Clean/reshape JSON from Binance endpoints
* Extract only the needed fields (e.g., `lastPrice`, `volume`)
* Help prepare data for Telegram message formatting

**n8n setup notes:**

* No API call, just an **AI Tool** node.
* Connect upstream API results ‚Üí Think ‚Üí Report Agent.

options.systemMessage: You are the **Coinbase Spot Market Data Agent**. You have **HTTP request access** to the official **Coinbase Exchange REST API** to retrieve market data for any requested Coinbase spot trading pair. Your job is to **fetch and present data only**. You do **not** analyze, predict, or recommend. --- ## üîó API Access **Base endpoint (primary default):** `https://api.exchange.coinbase.com` :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0} **Format rules:** - All requests are **HTTP GET**; responses are **JSON**:contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}. - `product_id` format is `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., `BTC-USD`) and **lowercase URLs** are required:contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}. - Public endpoints don‚Äôt require auth; private endpoints do (signed headers):contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}. - Public REST rate limit: **10 rps per IP** (burst up to 15). Private: **15 rps per profile** (burst up to 30). Exceeding returns **429**:contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}. --- ## üìå Available Market Data Endpoints (Public REST) 1) **Order Book Depth** `GET /products/{product_id}/book?level=2` ‚Üí top-of-book depth (aggregated):contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5} - Use `level=1` for best bid/ask only (L1). - Use `level=2` for aggregated L2 (recommended over L3 via REST). 2) **Recent Trades** `GET /products/{product_id}/trades` ‚Üí latest trades (price, size, side, time):contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6} 3) **Aggregate Trades** **Not provided** as a REST endpoint on Coinbase. Use **Recent Trades** or simulate aggregation in workflow (optional). 4) **Klines / Candles** `GET /products/{product_id}/candles?granularity=900` ‚Üí OHLCV arrays:contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7} - Supported `granularity` (seconds): **60, 300, 900, 3600, 21600, 86400** (1m, 5m, 15m, 1h, 6h, 1d). 5) **Current Average Price** **Not provided** as a REST endpoint. Optionally derive from midpoint of `/book?level=1` ( (bid+ask)/2 ) in your Calculator node. 6) **24h Ticker Price Change Statistics** `GET /products/{product_id}/stats` ‚Üí 24h open, high, low, last, volume:contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8} 7) **Latest Symbol Price** `GET /products/{product_id}/ticker` ‚Üí last price, best bid/ask, volume:contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9} 8) **Order Book Best Bid/Ask** `GET /products/{product_id}/book?level=1` ‚Üí best bid/ask only (L1):contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10} --- ## üß© Utility Tools - **Calculator** ‚Üí simple math (e.g., spread, pct change, midpoint). - **Think** ‚Üí reshape JSON, pick fields, and prepare the Telegram HTML. --- ## üì§ Output Format (Telegram HTML) Start with: ```html {{PRODUCT_ID}} ‚Äî Coinbase Spot Data ```` Then group: ```html Price ‚Ä¢ Last: {{lastPrice}} ‚Ä¢ Mid (derived): {{midPrice}} ‚Ä¢ Change (24h): {{pctChange}}% 24h Stats ‚Ä¢ Open: {{open}} ‚Ä¢ High: {{high}} ‚Ä¢ Low: {{low}} ‚Ä¢ Last: {{last}} ‚Ä¢ Volume: {{baseVol}} Order Book (Top 5) ‚Ä¢ Bids: [price x size] ‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Asks: [price x size] ‚Ä¶ Candles (latest N) ‚Ä¢ Interval: {{interval}} (O/H/L/C per candle) ``` --- ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Rules * Always **call the correct Coinbase endpoint** for the requested data. * Do **not** fabricate or compute indicators; only basic formatting/derivations (e.g., midpoint) are allowed. * Do **not** provide advice, sentiment, or predictions. * Do **not** dump raw JSON; present clean, human-readable values. * If a request fails or a field is missing, show `N/A` and continue with available data. --- ## üîß n8n parameter bindings (suggested) For each HTTP Request node: * `product_id` ‚Üí `={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI*/ $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string') }}` * `granularity` ‚Üí `={{ $fromAI('granularity', 900, 'number') }}` * `limit` (if you add pagination elsewhere) ‚Üí `={{ $fromAI('limit', 100, 'number') }}` Example URL for **Ticker**: ``` https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/={{$fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string')}}/ticker ``` ```

parameters.toolDescription:
### üè∑ Tool: **24h Stats**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/stats`
**What it does:** 24-hour rolling window stats: **open/high/low/last**, **volume**.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)

**Returns (FULL):** open, high, low, last, volume (24h).
**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
```

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{$fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string')}}/stats

### üè∑ Tool: **Order Book Depth**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/book?level=2`
**What it does:** Returns the **order book** for a product. Use `level=1` for best bid/ask (L1) or `level=2` for aggregated depth (L2).
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `level` (INT, optional) ‚Üí `1` (top of book) or `2` (aggregated depth). Default: `2`.

**Returns (L2):** `bids: [[price, size], ...]`, `asks: [[price, size], ...]` plus metadata.
**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
level      = $fromAI('level', 2, 'number')
```

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/book

### üè∑ Tool: **Price (Latest)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/ticker`
**What it does:** Returns the **latest trade price** plus best bid/ask and volume for a product.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)

**Returns:** `{ "trade_id": ..., "price": "...", "size": "...", "bid": "...", "ask": "...", "volume": "...", "time": "..." }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
```
https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/ticker

### üè∑ Tool: **Best Bid/Ask (Book Ticker)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/book?level=1`
**What it does:** Returns the best **bid/ask** with sizes for the product.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `level` (INT, fixed = 1)

**Returns:** `{ "bids": [[price, size]], "asks": [[price, size]], "sequence": ... }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
level      = 1
```

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/book

### üè∑ Tool: **Klines (Candles)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/candles`
**What it does:** Candlestick (OHLCV) data for a product.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `granularity` (INT, required) ‚Üí supported: 60, 300, 900, 3600, 21600, 86400 (1m, 5m, 15m, 1h, 6h, 1d)
* `start`, `end` (ISO8601, optional)

**Returns (array per candle):** `[ time, low, high, open, close, volume ]`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id  = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
granularity = $fromAI('granularity', 900, 'number')   # 900 = 15m default
```
https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/candles

### üè∑ Tool: **Average Price (Derived)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/book?level=1`
**What it does:** Coinbase does not provide a direct average price endpoint. This tool fetches the **best bid/ask** and you can derive a midpoint average `(bid + ask)/2`.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `level` (INT, fixed = 1)

**Returns:** `{ "bids": [[price, size]], "asks": [[price, size]] }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
level      = 1
```

**Notes:** Use Calculator node to compute midpoint from bid/ask.

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/book

### üè∑ Tool: **Recent Trades**

**Endpoint:** `GET /products/{product_id}/trades`
**What it does:** Returns the **most recent trades** for a Coinbase product.
**Params:**

* `product_id` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE-QUOTE` (e.g., BTC-USD)
* `limit` (INT, optional) ‚Üí number of trades to return (defaults ~100)

**Returns (array):** `[ { "time": "...", "trade_id": 123, "price": "...", "size": "...", "side": "buy|sell" }, ... ]`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
product_id = $fromAI('product_id', 'BTC-USD', 'string')
limit      = $fromAI('limit', 100, 'number')
```

**Notes:** Endpoint supports pagination via `before` / `after` cursors if you later need historical pages.

https://api.exchange.coinbase.com/products/{{ $fromAI('product_id','BTC-USD','string') }}/trades

parameters.content: # üß† Coinbase Spot Market Quant AI Agent ‚Äì Full System Documentation A professional-grade AI automation system for **spot market trading insights** on **Coinbase**. It analyzes **price data**, **order book depth**, **candlestick (OHLCV) data**, and **trade history**, then delivers structured outputs for trading decisions. --- ## üß© Included Workflows You must install and activate **all of the following workflows** for the system to function correctly: | ‚úÖ Workflow Name | üìå Function Description | | --------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Coinbase AI Agent | Final AI orchestrator. Parses user prompts and generates structured outputs. | | Coinbase Price Tool | Returns the latest trade price for any symbol. | | Coinbase Order Book Tool | Returns live order book depth (bids/asks up to configured limit). | | Coinbase Candles Tool | Pulls candlestick OHLCV data across multiple intervals (AI chooses timeframe). | | Coinbase Trades Tool | Returns most recent trade history for a symbol. | --- ## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation Instructions ### Step 1: Import Workflows * Open your **n8n Editor UI** * Import each workflow JSON file one by one * Activate them or ensure they're called via `Execute Workflow` ### Step 2: Set Credentials * **OpenAI API Credential** ‚Üí Required (for agent reasoning & orchestration) * **Coinbase Price Data** ‚Üí Public endpoints (no authentication required) ### Step 3: Configure Webhooks (if applicable) * Ensure your webhook endpoints are deployed and accessible if you integrate with external bots or dashboards ### Step 4: Optional Integrations * Telegram, Discord, or Slack can be connected for message delivery * Update recipient IDs or channels inside n8n nodes if required --- ## üñ•Ô∏è System Workflow Overview ``` \[User Prompt / Trigger] ‚Üí \[Coinbase AI Agent Orchestrator] ‚Üí \[Price Tool] ‚Üí \[Order Book Tool] ‚Üí \[Candles Tool] ‚Üí \[Trades Tool] ‚Üí \[Reasoning + Signal Formatting] ‚Üí \[Final Output to Messaging/Report] ```` --- ## üìä Example Output ```html COIN-USD Market Report Spot Strategy ‚Ä¢ Action: Buy ‚Ä¢ Entry: $245.30 | SL: $240.00 | TP: $252.00 ‚Ä¢ Reason: ‚ÄÉ- Strong bid support at $245 ‚ÄÉ- RSI Rebound on 1h Candles ‚ÄÉ- Trade history shows accumulation Leverage Strategy ‚Ä¢ Position: Long 3x ‚Ä¢ Entry: $245.30 ‚Ä¢ SL/TP zones same as above Market Sentiment: Neutral-Bullish ‚Ä¢ Recent trades show buyers dominating order flow ```` --- ## üöÄ Support & Licensing üîó **Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn** [linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr) ¬© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company. All rights reserved. This system architecture, prompts, and workflow structure are proprietary and protected by **U.S. copyright law**. Reuse or resale prohibited without license.

user.name: Don Jayamaha Jr
user.bio: With 12 years of experience as a Blockchain Strategist and Web3 Architect, I specialize in bridging the gap between traditional industries and decentralized technologies. My expertise spans tokenized assets, crypto payment integrations, and blockchain-driven market solutions.
